Job Description: We have multiple openings (fresher and entry-level) for software developers. Candidates interested in Web, Windows, or Mobile Application should apply.  You will be responsible for coding/programming.   Desired Candidate Profile :  Must have the zeal to learn and seriously looking to make a career in the IT software development field.Good programming and logical skills.Working knowledge of any programming language and SQL Concepts.Strong understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP).Willing to learn and adapt new technology, framework, and development tool.Showing a high level of technical excellence that will drive new ideas and deliver outstanding (and well-tested) code. Selected candidates will be offered one of the following roles after a training period of 3 months:1. Mobile Application Developer (Xamarin, UWP, Android, iOS) 2. MEAN Stack Developer3. IoT DeveloperExperience: 0 to 3 years of experience.Education: B.E/B.Tech in Computer Science, MCA, MSc (IT). Interview Process :After initial screening, a candidate will appear forAptitude Test (Onsite at Ahmedabad)Face to Face Technical InterviewFinal Interview
UG: BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Computers
